title: What happens when you're sick?
creator_credit: Michael Heldman and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Shows why we experience symptoms such as fever, sneezing, upset stomach and diarrhoea when we’re sick and symptoms such as bleeding, swelling, and pain when we’re injured.
description: Shows why we experience symptoms such as fever, sneezing, upset stomach and diarrhoea when we’re sick and symptoms such as bleeding, swelling, and pain when we’re injured.
